casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1963

(January 8, 1963) The People of the State of New York v. Arthur Middleton.

Motion to relieve court-assigned counsel granted and the order of this court entered on March 30, 1961 is amended by striking the designation of Anthony F. Marra, Esq., as counsel to prosecute the appeal taken by the defendant-appellant and by substituting therefor Kenneth Simon, Esq., of 400 Madison Ave., New York, N. Y., as such counsel. Concur —Botein, P. J., McNally, Stevens, Eager and Steuer, JJ.
